definition: a long stiff hair growing from the snout or brow of most mammals as e.g. a cat, furnish with whiskers
details:
noun
- a long stiff hair growing from the snout or brow of most mammals as e.g. a cat
= synonyms: vibrissa, sensory hair
- a very small distance or space
= synonyms: hair
verb
- furnish with whiskers
= example: furnish with whiskers
= synonyms: bewhisker
